attributes.action: Stop Centrica Plc (British Gas)from firing and rehiring its employees.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the government have a duty to protect its citizens from corporations who go around bullying employees.
This should be against the law and the govenment needs to step in to protect theus as key workers who for so many years have work so very hard accross the UK especially during the pandemic to keep peoples homes amd businesses running.
attributes.background: We want the govenment to step in and put a STOP to the firing and rehireing of centrica employees.These types of action should be made illegal. The fact that a company can just rip up contracts and then rehire on new contracts in the 20th century without the govenment stepping in is appauling.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319446
